item.title: Implement a Geo-distance search using .NET Aspire, Elasticsearch and ASP.NET Core
item.description: This article shows how to implement a geo location search in an ASP.NET Core application using a LeafletJs map. The selected location can be used to find the nearest location with an Elasticsearch Geo-distance query. The Elasticsearch container and the ASP.NET Core UI application are setup for development using .NET Aspire. Code: https://github.com/damienbod/WebGeoElasticsearch Setup For [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2024/09/23/implement-a-geo-distance-search-using-net-aspire-elasticsearch-and-asp-net-core/
